Events that occurred on 20 December.

content.title: On Earth
content.content:
1928 - Father Christmas writes a letter to J.R.R. Tolkien's children.
1949 - J.R.R. Tolkien writes letter 122a.
1954 - J.R.R. Tolkien writes Letter 158a.
1955 - J.R.R. Tolkien writes Letter 179a.
1955 - J.R.R. Tolkien writes Letter 179b.
1956 - J.R.R. Tolkien writes a letter to Deirdre Levinson.
1971 - Actor Michael Yurchak is born.
2002 - Tom Shippey publishes "The Plot Unravels", a review of The Lord of the Rings: The Two Towers in The Times Literary Supplement.

content.title: In Arda
content.content:
T.A. 3018:
The Fellowship of the Ring rests in Rivendell and prepare for their quest to destroy the One Ring.
